actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 35 of title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide educational benefits, on a prorated basis, to children of veterans having permanent service- connected disabilities rated at not less than 50 percent but less than total.

summary.text: Provides educational benefits, on a prorated basis, to children of veterans having permanent service-connected disabilities rated at not less than 50 percent but less than total. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1701, 1732,1742)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 35 of title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide educational benefits, on a prorated basis, to children of veterans having permanent service- connected disabilities rated at not less than 50 percent but less than total.
